summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Judkins Street from Bradner Place to a connection with the existing sewer in 27th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer under Ordinance No. 19015, creating Local Improvement District No. 1823 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
